name: Palantir
author: Klaufir
kultasakaali
description:
Create automatically updating embeds that display a list of (Q-)Zandronum servers, optionally notify certain roles about ongoing games.

Dependencies: maxminddb 2.5.1, pyzandro
install_msg: Thank you for installing Palantir. Please make sure your bot has the 'Manage Messages' permission so it can create and update an embed.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
